features: Our Sensitive Face Moisturizer contains Baobab, oat oil, and willow herb. It has been specifically formulated to hydrate the skin without leaving skin greasy or sticky.
All our Sensitive products are fragrance free to help minimize irritation.
Incredible natural skin care ingredients with carefully selected man-made ingredients to deliver super performance at an affordable price.
All our products are purpose built for men and contain amazing natural ingredients.
Our products never contain artificial colors, synthetic fragrances, or ingredients from animal sources.
body.description: Bulldog is man's best friend. Designed from the ground up with male skin care as their focus, all Bulldog products combine the best of nature and science to work simply and effectively while dealing with the specific issues faced by men's skin. Whether it's regular or sensitive skin, Bulldog has the answer. All Bulldog products contain brilliant natural ingredients and we combine these with carefully selected man-made ingredients to offer exceptional performance at an affordable price. From shave gel to face wash, beard oil to our award winning Original Moisturizer and everything in between, Bulldog has something for every man. Bulldog products never contain artificial colors, synthetic fragrances or ingredients from animal sources. All of our products are suitable for Vegans to Vegetarians and have been certified by Cruelty Free International. Turns out, Bulldog really is Man's Best Friend.We have a simple approach to the way we build our products and business: Do it the right way.Products we love made by people we know. We work with two main factories here in the UK in Froome, Somerset and in Preston, Lancashire. They make all of our skincare line. We also manufacture a small number of our products through specialist factories outside of the UK where they have unique skills.The best of nature and the best of science. We think that nature provides some incredible skincare ingredients. We harness these in conjunction with carefully selected man-made ingredients to deliver super performance at an affordable price.Treating people fairly. Whether it's our factories, farmers or other partners, we always aim to act with integrity and care.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Bulldog Skincare For Men is a vegan friendly skincare brand and certified by Cruelty Free International*. From the very first day of launch, we have never used artificial colors, synthetic fragrances or ingredients from animal sources. Whether you have regular, dry, sensitive, oily or mature skin, Bulldog is here to help you look and feel your best. *Registration # 3969409 Sensitive Moisturizer This moisturizer contains baobab oil, oat oil and willow herb. It has been specially formulated to hydrate the skin without leaving it greasy or sticky. This moisturizer also leaves the skin feeling refreshed and soft and is fragrance free. Fragrance free to help minimize irritation Hydrating moisturizer makes the perfect daily companion for your face Absorbs into the skin easily without feeling greasy or sticky Leaves the skin hydrated, soft and refreshed Ideal for everyday use on sensitive skin

About Bulldog Skincare For Men Our Approach We work with two main factories in the UK. They make all of our skincare line. Whether it’s our factories, farmers or other partners we always aim to act with integrity and care. Our Ingredients All our products are purposely built for men and contain natural ingredients. Be loyal to your skin. Our products never contain artificial colors, synthetic fragrances, or ingredients from animal sources. We have never used plastic microbeads, synthetic fragrances or artificial colors. Our Belief From our first day, we've always tried to make decisions that our customers could be proud of. We never use ingredients from animal sources and are certified by Cruelty Free International*. All our products are suitable for vegetarians and vegans. *Registration # 3969409

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I have very fussy skin. And a fussy sense of smell. This doesn't have any perfume smell to it, at all. But also doesn't have a funky glue smell to it either so it's a win. It really does have anti-inflammatory abilities and cuts down specifically on redness. Soothes and moisturizes all day. Very good. I am a fan.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars LOVE Bulldog products!!
reviews.reviewText: Love Bull Dog products! Best men’s line! And not too pricey!! Better than expensive brands! And Bull Dog products are environmentally friendly

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Its great moisturizer for men with dry skingreat price point too

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good for sensitive skin.
reviews.reviewText: It is getting more difficult to find affordable lotion specifically for sensitive skin. This lotion is excellent.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I’m a woman who uses this moisturizer
reviews.reviewText: I saw the “sensitive skin” moisturizer recommended by a dermatologist and I’m so glad I did. It changed my life! This is the only moisturizer that I’ve found that doesn’t break me out, but also makes my skin hydrated and beautiful. This brand is insanely underrated. Ladies, don’t be turned off by the fact that it’s a men’s brand. I will say, the other products that bulldog sells smell like cologne but the sensitive skin line is absolutely fantastic.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My Go-To Face Lotion
reviews.reviewText: Have been using this product for a few years now. It's great and I'm not turning back anytime soon!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent product for men with sensitive skin
reviews.reviewText: My husband loved this product & will be ordering more very soon !

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great as an aftershave
reviews.reviewText: I love the scent of this. I use Baxter's aftershave balm as well, where a little goes a long way. However, I just don't like the lemony scent of the Baxter's. The Bull Dog is great and feels refreshing after a shave. I wish the price would come back down a bit.
Ce n'ai pas nécessairement la meilleure crème pour homme à mon avis. Par contre, à ce prix, c'est très dur à battre et en bout de ligne, elle fait ce qu'elle annonce faire... c'est à dire hydrater!
A mi amigo le gustó, comentó que sobre todo matiza más que humectar a una piel sensible.
Buena crema, la sesible no tiene olor.
Excelente crema. No es demasiado grasosa. Se absorbe muy rápido.
